mapper.select: SELECT id, activityId, buildingNumber, unitNumber, floorNumber, roomNumber, houseType, status, phoneNumber, grabTime, createdAt, updatedAt FROM Rooms WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, activityId, buildingNumber, unitNumber, floorNumber, roomNumber, houseType, status, phoneNumber, grabTime, createdAt, updatedAt FROM Rooms WHERE activityId = #{activityId} ORDER BY buildingNumber, unitNumber, floorNumber, roomNumber
